mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.name as user_name, u.role as user_role FROM ratings r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.script_id = #{scriptId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
SELECT AVG(total_score) FROM ( SELECT script_id, MAX(total_score) as total_score FROM ratings GROUP BY script_id ) t

SELECT grade, COUNT(*) as count FROM ( SELECT script_id, CASE WHEN MAX(compliance_score) < 60 THEN 'D' WHEN MAX(total_score) >= 90 THEN 'S' WHEN MAX(total_score) >= 80 THEN 'A' WHEN MAX(total_score) >= 70 THEN 'B' WHEN MAX(total_score) >= 60 THEN 'C' ELSE 'D' END as grade FROM ratings GROUP BY script_id ) t GROUP BY grade
